entries.title: First LastPass, now Slack and CircleCI. The hacks go on (and will likely worsen)
entries.description: Don't expect victims to be forthcoming. Their alerts conceal more than they reveal.

entries.title: Android one-ups Apple’s satellite SOS with general-purpose satellite SMS
entries.description: Qualcomm packs traditional Iridium satellite compatibility into a normal phone.

entries.title: Ram shows off its first fully electric pickup truck at CES, due 2024
entries.description: Ram went for futuristic styling for its first full-size EV pickup.

entries.title: Razer’s $400 soundbar has a creepy camera to help emit surround sound
entries.description: Always-on, shutter-free IR cameras make their way to PC audio.

entries.title: WhatsApp just made it harder to censor citizens with Internet shutdowns
entries.description: Report says 710 million people were impacted by Internet shutdowns in 2022.

entries.title: FTC intends to ban noncompete clauses that bind 30 million US workers
entries.description: Noncompetes are "an unfair method of competition" and violate US law, FTC says.

entries.title: AMD’s new RDNA 3 GPUs will compete with Nvidia for mid-range gaming laptops
entries.description: AMD (sort of weirdly) says the laptop GPUs can beat a desktop RTX 3060.

entries.title: After $414M fine, Meta tries to avoid seeking user consent for personalized ads
entries.description: Privacy activists explain why asking for consent may be Meta's only option.

entries.title: Lenovo’s Yoga Book 9i is an unprecedented laptop for people who hate foldables
entries.description: A laptop made of displays is a cheaper, weird alternative to foldable PCs.

entries.title: How humans got a new gene that makes our brains larger
entries.description: Somewhere between chimps and us, an RNA started producing a useful protein.

entries.title: Investors settle Cyberpunk 2077 lawsuit with developer for $1.85 million
entries.description: CD Projekt Red shareholders will split a fraction of what they claimed to lose.

entries.title: Lenovo Tab Extreme takes on the iPad Pro, complete with Magic Keyboard clone
entries.description: It's a laptop-sized tablet with a laptop-sized price tag.

entries.title: Over a million could die as China’s COVID wave crashes into huge holiday
entries.description: With mass Lunar New Year travel later this month, COVID may devastate rural areas.

entries.title: Google’s HD map is coming to the Polestar 3 electric SUV
entries.description: The more accurate map lets a car know exactly which lane it's in.

entries.title: Mercedes-Benz will build a $1 billion EV fast-charging network in the US
entries.description: Working with ChargePoint, it will install more than 2,500 chargers at 400 sites by 2027.

entries.title: Cadillac wants to enter Formula 1 with Andretti Global
entries.description: But the new team's bid needs to gain approval from the FIA and 10 existing teams.

entries.title: Amazon expands layoffs from 10,000 to 18,000 jobs as stock price keeps falling
entries.description: CEO blames "uncertain economy" and Amazon's rapid hiring in previous years.

entries.title: Sony announces new controller aimed at gamers with disabilities
entries.description: Announcement comes over four years after Microsoft's own Adaptive Controller launch.

entries.title: Lenovo puts the legendary ThinkPad brand on a phone: Meet the ThinkPhone
entries.description: It has business branding, but it forgot the business hardware features.

entries.title: Long COVID stemmed from mild cases of COVID-19 in most people
entries.description: 90% of people living with long COVID initially experienced only mild illness.

entries.title: Sony’s electric car plans become clearer as it shows off prototype at CES
entries.description: The new brand is called Afeela and goes on sale late 2025.

entries.title: Gene therapy has made some recent progress—is it enough?
entries.description: Despite a bumpy history, through work and trust, gene therapy may have a future.

entries.title: BMW is developing a full-screen head-up display for 2025’s Neue Klasse
entries.description: The EVs, due in three years, are meant to be revolutionary rather than evolutionary.

entries.title: AMD’s Ryzen 7000 laptop CPU lineup is a bewildering patchwork of old and new
entries.description: Four CPU architectures and three GPU architectures get mixed-and-matched.

entries.title: AMD intros cheaper Ryzen 7000 CPUs, plus faster gaming-focused 3D V-Cache models
entries.description: Cheaper 65 W versions and high-performance 3D V-Cache CPUs join the lineup.
